traits.name: Feed on Death
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the kraul drops to 0 hit points, the kraul or another creature of its choice within 30 feet of it gains 5 ({@dice 1d10}) temporary hit points, provided the kraul isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Hive Mind
entries: The kraul is immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The kraul makes one attack with its quarterstaff and casts one of its spells with a casting time of 1 action.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
